name: Super Sparty Bros.
description:
This is a game I, Nathaniel Shumaker, created while taking the Michigan State University online course, Game Design and Development.  This course specialized in using the Unity 3D engine and the assets you'll see were provided by the course and instructors.  Assets credit goes to the creators of the course as well as the instructors in which whom taught the course.  This game is SUPER SPARTY BROS.!!!!

-Collect the 'Roses' to advanced to the next level, if you die 3 times in a level you will have to start over.  You can choose the most recent level you achieved from the level select button at the main menu.

-You may also jump on top of the enemy knights to stun them, but be weary.. they are only stunned for a few seconds.

-WSAD or Directional Keys for basic movement.

-Space Bar allows Sparty to Jump, remember you can 'double jump'.. you'll need this (trust me).
